definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
to release/to issue/to announce/to distribute/also written 發布|发布[fa1 bu4]
to scatter/to distribute/to be distributed (over an area etc)/(statistical, geographic) distribution
to put in order/to arrange/to decorate/to fix up/to deploy
variant of 開誠布公|开诚布公[kai1 cheng2 bu4 gong1]
posting on a bulletin board/notice/bulletin/to announce
Branson or Brandsen (name)/Sir Richard Branson (1950-), British millionaire and founder of Virgin

sentences.english: Whether there are problems in the dressing room over Ibra?
sentences.chinese: 伊佈會不會造成更衣室問題？

sentences.english: A moist cloth will prevent this from happening as much as possible.
sentences.chinese: 用溼佈會儘量防止這樣的問題發生。

sentences.english: The six yard cloth is draped in different styles for various regions.
sentences.chinese: 在不同地區，這六碼長的佈會以不同的風格披上去。

sentences.english: Once more the Philistines raided the valley;
sentences.chinese: 非利士人又佈散在利乏音谷。

sentences.english: A false witness that speaketh lies, and he that soweth discord mong brethren.
sentences.chinese: 吐謊言的假見證，並弟兄中佈散紛爭的人。

sentences.english: Public briefings are organised for the affected parties of the urban renewal projects.
sentences.chinese: 爲受市區重建項目影響的人士舉行簡佈會。

sentences.english: The Mirror says Liverpool want to grab Boudebouz of Sochaux in the transfer window.
sentences.chinese: 鏡報聲稱利物浦想在下個轉會窗口簽下佈德布茲。

sentences.english: The pontiff was speaking to pilgrims at his summer palace.
sentences.chinese: 教皇正在其夏宮向朝聖者佈教。

sentences.english: Then the Philistines went up, and pitched in Judah, and spread themselves in Lehi.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人上去安營在猶大，佈散在利希。

sentences.english: Budd won't even look me in the eye.
sentences.chinese: 佈德都不屑政研看我一眼。

sentences.english: Plain and simple, it’s cheaper to use cloth.
sentences.chinese: 很簡單，使用佈會更省錢。

sentences.english: He loads the clouds with moisture; he scatters his lightning through them.
sentences.chinese: 他使密雲盛滿水氣，佈散電光之雲。

sentences.english: And the Philistines yet again spread themselves abroad in the valley.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人又佈散在利乏音谷。

sentences.english: So as long as the devil is hiding the details, the question remains.
sentences.chinese: 只要這樣的魔鬼故佈疑陣，問題就會始終存在。

sentences.english: And the Philistines came up yet again, and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人又上來，佈散在利乏音谷。

sentences.english: Puts forward some views to net form and measuring method.
sentences.chinese: 另外對導線佈網形式及測設方法提出了一些看法。

definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)
to release/to issue/to announce/to distribute/also written 發布|发布[fa1 bu4]
to issue (an order, decree etc)/to send out/to dispatch/to produce (a sound)/to let out (a laugh)
